subject: Throttle issue after Software Update
description_text:
Good morning,
I just bought a set of the Pro Plus X pedals (Throttle and Brake only). They worked fantastic the first day, then after the newest Simsonn Manager update, I have about a 30-50% deadzone on my throttle. It doesn’t detect input until the last 10-15CM of throw cause major difficulties while driving. I would graciously accept some assistance!
Thank you,
Austin
Sent from my iPhone

conversations.body_text: Hi Austin Hughey,  You can use the Offset function in SIMSONN Manager 2.0.9 to reset the initial travel of the pedal to 0%. This will effectively eliminate any dead zone.
